casebody.data:
Vaughn ROSS, petitioner,
v.
William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 12-10154, 12A1086. Supreme Court of the United States July 18, 2013.

Case below, Ross v. Thaler, 511 Fed.Appx. 293.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
